lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Dough-Boy/王嘉尔
[00:01.000] 作词 : Dough-Boy/王嘉尔
[00:18.941][00:13.264]I know where I‘m from and where I’m going
[00:22.145][00:16.365]Rolling with my squad I‘m not alone
[00:24.038]You see me dripping cross them
[00:27.355]朗豪坊  都做紧中国主导
[00:30.653]Look close, pay attention a little more
[00:33.753]将军澳区响到公主道
[00:36.787]You see me dripping cross them
[00:40.149]朗豪坊  都做紧中国主导
[00:43.507]Look close, pay attention a little more
[00:46.558]将军澳区响到公主道
[00:50.815]The city of neon lights
[00:52.463]Who run the streets at night?
[00:54.123]We don‘t show no emotions
[00:55.619]But we gon be alright
[00:57.251]Ain‘t nowhere we could run to
[00:58.897]In this concrete jungle
[01:00.412]From Kowloon down to Hong Kong
[01:02.143]Watch when you cross that tunnel
[01:03.686]Saw how my cousin get caught up and trapped
[01:05.352]Try coming out but it‘s hard to adapt
[01:06.909]I brought out my boys, make dough in the game
[01:08.546]Always lay low I ain‘t showing my chains
[01:10.129]We go hard in the night shift
[01:11.751]Living in the city full of vices
[01:13.334]If it ain‘t about money don’t talk to me
[01:14.766]If it ain‘t about money don’t talk to me
[01:16.537]Till my dad, he don‘t work no more
[01:18.141]Till my heart, it don’t hurt no more
[01:19.703]Give my girl that life she want
[01:21.331]That‘s what I’m writing these verses for
[01:23.319]Ooh, say what you want about me
[01:26.513]Real players never lose focus at the party
[01:29.549]I sleep with one eye open
[01:31.135]I never trust nobody
[01:32.736]Never caught up in the moment
[01:34.272]My day ones, yeah they got me
[01:36.218]Ooh, rival crews we took them down
[01:39.135]Now everyday, I‘m looking out
[01:41.018]You see me dripping cross them
[01:44.119]朗豪坊 都做紧中国主导
[01:47.370]Look close pay attention a little more
[01:50.507]将军澳区响到公主道
[01:53.543]You see me dripping cross them
[01:56.924]朗豪坊 都做紧中国主导
[02:00.183]Look close pay attention a little more
[02:03.361]将军澳区响到公主道
[02:08.127]Calling it right
[02:09.074]Doing it tight
[02:09.802]Fashion killa drip
[02:11.207]Got them tats on their arm
[02:12.516]Axe dragons on the arm
[02:14.524]Holes in them jeans, yeah
[02:15.719]Dying their hair
[02:16.673]Don‘t really care
[02:17.605]They call them a clown
[02:18.607]Walking in town
[02:19.389]Pulling them pants down
[02:20.877]Rolling in bands
[02:22.140]Get off doing their dance
[02:22.807]This is their chance yeah
[02:24.087]Mongkok vibe
[02:24.965]Why is it bad?
[02:25.717]Why is it bad?
[02:27.215]Do what you want, follow your dream
[02:28.902]Follow your dream
[02:30.506]I used to fence
[02:31.214]Followed my dream
[02:32.080]Made it Team Wang
[02:35.224]You see me dripping cross them
[02:38.448]朗豪坊   都做紧中国主导
[02:41.673]Look close, pay attention a little more
[02:44.837]将军澳区响到公主道
[02:47.944]You see me dripping cross them
[02:51.238]朗豪坊   都做紧中国主导
[02:54.531]Look close, pay attention a little more
[02:57.631]将军澳区响到公主道
[03:08.524][03:02.701]I know where I‘m from and where I’m going
[03:11.668][03:05.993]Rolling with my squad I‘m not alone
